method.name: OpenScanner
method.comment: Turn on the power for the scanner. Return true if successful, false if failed.

method.name: IsScanOpened
method.comment: Get the scanner status. Return true for open or false for closed.

method.name: CloseScanner
method.comment: Turn off the power for the scanner. Return true if successful, false if failed.

method.name: SetScanVibrate
method.comment: Vibrate when the scan is successful. Set true for On or false for Off. Returns true for setting successfully.

method.name: GetOutScanMode
method.comment: Get the barcode output mode. Return output mode.

method.name: GetScanLaserMode
method.comment: Get the laser continuous mode. Returns continuous mode(4) or single mode(8) setting.

method.name: SetIndicatorLightMode
method.comment: Blink the indicator lamp when the scan is successful. Param mode True(On) indicator lamp, False(Off) no indicator lamp.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object was initialized.

method.name: SetScanBeep
method.comment: Beep when the scan is successful. Set true for On or false for Off. Returns true for setting successfully.

method.name: SetOutScanMode
method.comment: Set the barcode output mode. Param mode value: 0 Broadcast mode, 1 Editbox Mode, 2 Keyboard Mode. Return true if successful, false if failed.

method.name: GetScanVibrateState
method.comment: Get the vibrate status. Returns true for On or false for Off.

method.name: StopScan
method.comment: Stop decoding. Return true if stopped successfully.

method.name: GetScanBeepState
method.comment: Get the beep status. Returns true for On or false for Off.

method.name: GetScanCodeValue
method.comment: Get the scan data at broadcast mode. Return only scan data, can use after scan complete. I personally recommend using the B4A Receiver Module after scanning a barcode.

method.name: StartScan
method.comment: Start decoding. Return true if the trigger is already active.

method.name: SetScanLaserMode
method.comment: Set the laser continuous scan mode. Param mode start continuous scan True(On), stop continuous scan False(Off).

method.name: GetIndicatorLightMode
method.comment: Get the blink indicator lamp mode. Returns true for On or false for Off.

method.name: ResetScan
method.comment: Reset the scanner. Return true if reset successfully.
